name: SPACEBAR
description:
Free the galaxy from alien invasion in a hectic Shoot 'Em Up in c64

style and try to make as many points as possible. And do not forget to
press the spacebar.

System requirements

CPU = intel dual core / quad / amd / x2 / x3 / x4 2.60 Ghz

4gb ram

video card = intel Hd 4400 Ati radeon 4670 512 mb / nvidia 9600 GT or higher

remember to install the dxwebsetup included in the package .
